data.name: Masters of Puzzle - Halloween Edition: Sing Me a Pumpkin
data.detailed_description:
The illustration Sing Me a Pumpkin is our two-piece debut of the Bulgarian illustrator Stanislav Karmashikov. This puzzle box is part of our special Halloween Edition series and will be released during our Halloween 2018 event. We hope you will appreciate the fun and very unique art, the great illustration, and have a great time building this puzzle in all the available variations.

Special Achievement

Apart from the usual completion achievements, this puzzle box comes with a very special and limited achievement! Make sure to complete this puzzle in any tileset configuration before 10th of November in order to get it and see what it is.

Content Details

Contains one new puzzle box for Masters of Puzzle playable in variations of 250, 500, 750, 1000, 1500, and 2000 puzzle tiles. The HD image is the original digital illustration as provided by the author and provides a good level of details. This puzzle is somewhat challenging as it has a large area consisting of similar details, but it also provides a multitude of unique details to help you reconstruct that area around them. Beginners might find it slightly more difficult when compared to skilled puzzle builders, who should find the image a relaxing and fun experience.

data.short_description: A special edition puzzle box in the traditional art for the Masters of Puzzle game.
data.supported_languages: English, Bulgarian, Portuguese, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, German

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 64-bit, Windows 8 64-bit or Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: 2 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 560 or Equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 25 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Min requirements might be subject of a change
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: 2.6 GHz Quad Core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 950 or Equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 25 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requirements might be subject of a change
